content:
We are a Charitable Company Limited by Guarantee, established to promote education in arts and sustainable conservation of the environment and endangered species. Our aim is to provide a new model for working collaboratively to host educational, sustainable events and to address social and environmental issues that require our urgent attention. We strive to provide innovative and creative solutions to the challenges we face, using the power of the arts to inspire and educate the public.

As a charity, we use any financial surplus generated by our events to further our wider educational and environmental objectives. This may include seeding projects and funding educational activities that align with our mission. Our work is guided by a strong commitment to sustainability and environmental conservation, and we seek to make a positive impact on the world around us.
